title: Consider the Audience
text: Visuals are used to make complex information more accessible to the audience.

title: Engagement Factor
text: Visuals help maintain the audience's attention during a presentation.

title: Clarity and Illustration
text: Visuals can illustrate key points more clearly than text alone.

title: Complementary Role
text: Visuals should complement the verbal explanation, not replace it entirely.

hintAnswer: To enhance understanding and engagement by illustrating key points clearly.
title: Purpose of Visuals
text: The primary purpose of using visuals is to enhance understanding and engagement by illustrating key points clearly.
choices: To make the presentation look more colorful and attractive.
To fill up space in the slides.
To enhance understanding and engagement by illustrating key points clearly.
To replace the need for verbal explanation entirely.
